typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee alterRow(updateIf(deptId == 1),
	deleteIf(deptId == 2),
	upsertIf(deptId == 3)) ~> AlteractionMade
AlteractionMade sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['empId'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmployeeFileToDB
